name: c4 sandbox
description:
I've been too busy to finish this jam, BUT I've decided to publish what I made anyways. No goal or anything, just plant c4s to blow up the buildings and watch the fun little particle effects.

If you want to reload the map, you'll just have to reload the page sorry

Controls:

Arrow keys to Move

Z to place c4

X to detonate c4 and to show score
